alert.note: Alert for Clark; Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 10:14PM CDT until March 11 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Garland County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... West central Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 1000 PM CST. * At 913 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Norman, or 9 miles south of Mount Ida, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Glenwood... Amity... Norman... Lofton... DeGray Lake State Park... Bismarck... Alpine... Salem in Pike County... Bonnerdale... Welsh... Rosboro... Point Cedar... Hopper... Pearcy... Caddo Gap... Pettyview... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Pike
